'''''Minecraft x Dragon Ball Z''''' is a merchandise collaboration between ''[[Minecraft]]'' and the ''{{Wikipedia|Dragon Ball Z}}'' series, which is part of the ''{{Wikipedia|Dragon Ball}}'' Japanese multimedia franchise.<ref>{{Mcnet|mclive_fall2025_recap|Minecraft LIVE September 2025: The Recap|September 19, 2025|Staff}}</ref><ref>{{Mcnet|dragon-ball-z|Dragon Ball Z|November 4, 2025|[[Julius Olofsson]]}}</ref>

== Background ==
{{Empty section}}

== Marketplace releases ==

=== Dragon Ball Z ===
{{Main|Dragon Ball Z DLC}}
Developed by [[Cyclone]], a special collaboration world was released on November 4, 2025, featuring many characters and scenarios from the franchise.

== Trivia ==

* Many years prior to the collaboration, [[Ash Davis]] joked about the dragon balls in a [[Minecraft.net]] article centering on a build challenge.<ref>{{Mcnet|monthly-build-challenge|The Monthly Build Challenge|July 7, 2018|[[Ash Davis]]}}</ref>
* Much of the Dragon Ball mythology, such as Goku and Oolong, were heavily inspired by the classic Chinese novel ''{{w|Journey to the West}}''.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://dragonball.fandom.com/wiki/Journey_to_the_West|title=Journey to the West|website=Dragon Ball Wiki}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://journeytothewestresearch.com/2021/11/20/dragon-ball-and-journey-to-the-west/|title=Dragon Ball and Journey to the West|author=[https://journeytothewestresearch.com/author/ghostexorcist/ Jim R. McClanahan]|website=Journey to the West Research|date=November 20, 2021}}</ref> Coincidentally, this also received a [[Journey to the West Skin Pack|prior skin pack]].
